name: Healthyfied Cajun Chicken
description: This Healthyfied Cajun Chicken recipe is perfect for those who are looking for a tasty, high-protein, and low-carb meal. It's seasoned with a spicy cajun style seasoning, fresh thyme, and rosemary, making it a flavorful yet health-conscious choice. Suitable for anyone looking to maintain a healthy diet without compromising on taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the chicken breasts by trimming any excess fat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, mix together thyme, rosemary, ground black pepper, and cajun style seasoning.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Rub the seasoning mix onto both sides of the chicken breasts.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a skillet over medium heat and add butter.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Once the butter is melted, add the seasoned chicken breasts to the skillet and cook for 5 minutes on each side or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C), adjusting the heat as necessary to prevent burning.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle the Kikoman over the chicken during the last minute of cooking.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
